ping: Pong! Why did you wake me up?
greeting: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hello there! Ready for some fun?
Hi! I was just thinking about you!
botMention: That's me! What can I do for you?
I heard my name! You think I'm cool?
roast: I may be a bot, but at least I don't rage quit Bedwars!
Says the person talking to a robot...
I'm programmed to be awesome, what's your excuse?
Beep boop, error 404: good comeback not found!
I'd roast you back, but I don't want to set off the fire alarms!
That's rich coming from someone with a skill issue!
compliment: Aww, thank you! You're pretty great yourself!
Thanks! I try my best to be helpful!
That means a lot coming from you!
You just made my day! Thank you!
thanks: Anytime! That's what I'm here for!
howAreYou: I'm doing great! Thanks for asking!
I'm wonderful! How are you doing?
Fantastic! Ready to help with whatever you need!
I'm thriving! Thanks for checking in!
whatsUp: Just hanging out in the guild!
Watching the chat and ready to help!
Living the bot life! What about you?
The usual - being the best bot I can be!
coinflip: *coin spins through the air* **{result}** it is!
tps: Server TPS: 20.0 (Optimal) | Performance varies by lobby
Hypixel TPS: ~20.0 | May fluctuate during peak times
TPS Status: 20.0 target | Check varies by server load

help.generalMessage: Fun Bot: !ping !cf !random [max] !tps !help [cmd] | Say hi to chat with me!
